notificationId.title: Workspace
notificationId.description: Workspace within the deployment to send the search results to.

searchId.title: Search Id
searchId.description: Id of the search this function is running on.

trigger.title: Trigger condition expression
trigger.description: Js expression that filters events, a greater than 'Trigger Count' events will trigger the notification

triggerType.title: Trigger type
triggerType.description: Type of the trigger condition. custom applies a kusto expression over the results, and results count applies a comparison over results count

triggerComparator.title: Count comparator
triggerComparator.description: Operation to be applied over the results count

triggerCount.title: Trigger Count
triggerCount.description: How many results that match trigger the condition

resultsLimit.title: Top number results
resultsLimit.description: Number of results to include in the notification event

message.title: Message content
message.description: Message content template, available fields: searchId, resultSet, savedQueryId, notificationId, searchResultsUrl

authToken.title: Api Auth Token
authToken.description: Auth token for sending notification messages
